categories: Category:Imperial Army personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Brukes was a Human female who served as an ensign in the Imperial Army of the Sith Empire during the Cold War and Galactic War with the Galactic Republic. She was stationed on Vaiken Spacedock, where she dispensed starship upgrades to agents of the Empire.
Ensign Brukes first appeared in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic by BioWare as the Starship Upgrades vendor aboard Vaiken Spacedock.
